00008 class ORTek754DScopeDataDecoder : public ORVEventCounterDecoder
00009 {
00010   public:
00011     ORTek754DScopeDataDecoder() {}
00012     virtual ~ORTek754DScopeDataDecoder() {}
00013 
00014     virtual inline UInt_t GPIBAddressOf(UInt_t* record)
00015       { return (record[1] & 0x07800000) >> 23; }
00016     virtual inline UInt_t ChannelOf(UInt_t* record)
00017       { return (record[1] & 0x00780000) >> 19; }
00018     virtual inline UInt_t NBytesOfDataOf(UInt_t* record)
00019       { return (LengthOf(record) - 2)*sizeof(UInt_t); }
00020     virtual inline void CopyDataOf(UInt_t* record, UChar_t* data)
00021       { memcpy(data, record, NBytesOfDataOf(record)); }
00022     virtual inline UInt_t NDataOf(UInt_t* record)
00023       { return NBytesOfDataOf(record); }
00024     virtual inline int IthDataOf(UInt_t* record, size_t iData) { 
00025       //int data = (record[iData/4+2] && (0xffff << (3 - iData%4))) >> (3 - iData%4); 
00026       int data = (((UChar_t*) record) + 8)[iData];
00027       return data >= 128 ? data-256 : data;
00028       return data;
00029     }
00030 
00031     // for event counter
00032     virtual inline size_t GetEventCount(UInt_t* /*record*/) { return 1; }
00033 
00034     virtual std::string GetDataObjectPath() { return "ORTek754DModel:ScopeData"; }
00035 };
